  • 1.16.3
  • View page source

1.16.3¶

General¶

Enhancements¶

  • Consistency checks: Auditor is not able to handle dumps on non-SRM endpoint #429
  • Core & Internals: dataset thread in kronos dies when RSE doesn’t exist #1184
  • Infrastructure: Rework docker images for Kubernetes #1086
  • Infrastructure: server and daemons container builds are failing caused by pip install #1190
  • Transfers: Fixes for replica selection in conveyor #667

Bugs¶

  • Clients: rucio set-metadata returns status code 0 for non-existing DID #493
  • Consistency checks: Auditor does not work with certain HTTPS dumps #367
  • Core & Internals: DB exception occur after detach and attach DID repeatedly #1004
  • Core & Internals: Credentials config/file should be optional not mandatory #1144
  • Transfers: transfers: verify_checksum badly propagated #1219

Clients¶

Enhancements¶

  • Clients: Raise Meaningful Exception When Protocol Fails To Get Checksum #1149
  • Clients: clients: workaround url signature for rucio download until download-api is deployed #1208

Bugs¶

  • Clients: rucio erase with wildcards #406
  • RSE Manager: RSE manager: remove .part from filename if adler32 is set and ignore_checksum is true #1185
